tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
  sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  sample_date DATE,
  soil_ph FLOAT,
  soil_moisture FLOAT,
  nutrient_levels JSON
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(50),
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    pH FLOAT,
    moisture_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    date_analyzed DATE,
    nutrient_levels JSON,
    irrigation_recommendation VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES SoilSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_samples (
    sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT,
    date_collected DATE,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    moisture_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE fertilization_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT REFERENCES soil_samples(sample_id),
    fertilizer_type VARCHAR(50),
    application_date DATE,
    application_amount FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE irrigation_records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT REFERENCES soil_samples(sample_id),
    irrigation_type VARCHAR(50),
    irrigation_date DATE,
    irrigation_amount FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE SoilSamples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    drone_id INT,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    moisture_level FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Fertilization (
    fertilization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    fertilization_date DATE,
    type VARCHAR(50),
    amount FLOAT,
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES SoilSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Irrigation (
    irrigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    irrigation_date DATE,
    duration_hours FLOAT,
    method VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES SoilSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Drone (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_name VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    operator_name VARCHAR(50),
    max_flight_time_hours FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Soil_Samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sampling_date DATE,
    drone_id INT,
    soil_type TEXT,
    moisture_level DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Fertilization_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    fertilizer_type TEXT,
    quantity_used DECIMAL,
    application_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Irrigation_Records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id INT,
    irrigation_type TEXT,
    duration_minutes INT,
    application_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Drone_Locations (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    altitude DECIMAL,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Field_Details (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    size_acres DECIMAL,
    crop_type TEXT
);
